name: Spiritualist's Call
text: Whenever you summon your phantom, it is more powerful for a brief period of time.
benefit: Whenever you summon your phantom, you can give it a +2 enhancement bonus to its Strength, Dexterity, or Charisma. This bonus lasts for 10 minutes after the summoning ritual is complete.
text_zh: 每当你召唤魅影时，它都会在短时间内获得更为强大的力量。
benefit_zh: 每当你召唤自己的魅影时，都会让它在力量、敏捷或魅力上获得+2增强加值。该加值在召唤仪式完成后会持续10分钟。
